# tabTitle

**Instance Property**

A short title that describes the content of the tab.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var tabTitle: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

CarPlay only uses the title when the template is a root-template of a tab bar, otherwise setting this property has no effect.

## Accessing Tab Information

- **tabImage**: An image that represents the content of the tab.
- **tabSystemItem**: A system object that provides a title and image for common tab content, such as contacts or favorites.
- **showsTabBadge**: An indicator you use to call attention to the tab.
